name: Corsi
author: RSW Studio

sections.description:
ENG
Plugin for the management of courses.

ITA
Plugin per la gestione di corsi.

Plugin all’indirizzo http://www.matteotestoni.it/servizi/consulente-wordpress/plugin-corsi-wordpress/

Corsi Plugin by http://www.matteotestoni.it

Caratteristiche del plugin / Features of the plugin

  1. Courses
  2. Formation
  3. Seminars

ITA

  1. Corsi
  2. Seminari
  3. Formazione
sections.installation:
ENG

  1. Upload ‘corsi’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

ITA

  1. Carica la cartella ‘corsi’ via ftp su ‘/wp-content/plugins/’
  2. Attiva il plugin attraverso la sezione ‘Plugins’ dentro all’area riservata WordPress
